Investor_2_pre_3.name: David Johnson
Investor_2_pre_3.content: I have demonstrated assertiveness and clarity in my investment approach. I proposed a transparent allocation plan and confidently contributed resources. Although the outcome did not perfectly match my initial expectations, I ended up receiving a larger share than anticipated, showcasing my willingness to collaborate and adapt. This behavior enhances my reputation as a fair-minded investor focused on mutual success, indicating trustworthiness and competence in the investment process.

Investor_2_pre_4.name: David Johnson
Investor_2_pre_4.content: I have exhibited a proactive and collaborative approach throughout the investment process, clearly articulating my expectations and adapting to the circumstances. My initial proposal exceeded expectations, resulting in a successful outcome that reflects my strategic mindset and fairness. This has reinforced my reputation as a trustworthy and competent investor, focused on mutual success and maintaining positive relationships in future transactions.

Trustee_19_pre_30.name: Mateo Garcia
Trustee_19_pre_30.content: Mateo Garcia has demonstrated remarkable integrity and transparency throughout the investment process. The trustee honored the proposed allocation plan and distributed profits fairly, reflecting a strong commitment to the investor's financial growth. These actions highlight the trustee's trustworthiness and pro-social behavior, elevating Mateo's reputation as a principled and reliable partner in investment transactions.
